author: affiliates@fandango.com
title: 2. A Dog's Purpose $18.4M
text: The Animal Abuse Videos are Edited By sheltiesmomx2 Don't let the media hype stop you from seeing this movie. The clip they are blasting all over the internet has been manipulated to lead you to believe it's something it's not. Why would anyone who... dog lovers brjng your tissues By cgraceburdette I cried, I laughed and I loved every second of it. boyfriend didn't hate it and was surprised he liked it after seeing how critics had reviewed it. go see this movie ... Best movie in v.long time By dfinnharkin I am a totally dog lover so when I saw the movie trailer I knew I would like this. My kids age 5&7&15 also loves it but we do love dogs. It's a feel good happy movie. A have to see... Heartwarming, beautiful family film. By Sarabi1166 Was so excited to finally see a decent film put out for animal lovers. A feel good film for the whole family. Side note: do your research if you have concerns. Gavin Polone wrote an excellent... If you love dogs, don't see this film. By bayareapilot View the video of the german shepherd that the 'trainer' had to throw the dog into the rushing water set. Filming was cut when the dog started to drown and people jumped in to save the dog. ... Great Movie! By rostrow24 Really nice movie for all ages. Loved the script, the voice over, the dogs, the actors. The movie got poor 'rotten tomatoes' reviews. Too bad those people are 'too cool for school'. Go see A Dog's... BEAUTIFUL FILM! By mlcwildrocker87 Please note that any bad review towards this movie is because of the cut and edited video from fake news TMZ and the hypocrisy from PETA, out to harm its premiere. This is a great movie! Very... A dogs purpose By Karenleecoyle Saw it opening night and Loved it! A good family movie especially for dog lovers. I happily cried through the whole movie. Great!... Bring Tissue By ritaodavis We just finished watching A Dog's Purpose, the best movie ever, I was crying, the big guy next to me was crying, Beautiful movies, my daughter loved it, I want to go see it again. #DogLover... Great movie By taymensinger This is a great movie for all ages and it hits all of the feelings. Must see! The dog trainers did a great job....
